Lines.Description: Print 'Runtime Error: Bad teleporter' on quit
If 'camera_x' LessThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00001198
If 'camera_x' GreaterThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00001280
If 'camera_y' LessThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001362
If 'camera_y' GreaterThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001444
Print 'AGA is required for this Scorpion Engine Game' on quit
Print 'Cannot set yres while level loaded' on quit
Yield on actor timer to  next line
Yield on actor timer to  next line
Yield on actor timer to  next line
Yield on actor timer to  next line
Yield on actor timer to  next line
